title: Subtitle Translation Wizard 4.7.0
description:
Release date: 08/01/2016

The easy subtitle translation tool.

Supports srt, sub(MicroDVD format), Sami(.smi), SubViewer(.SUB) and SubViewer 2.0 format.

What you need to do is just load your subtitle and choose target language, then you get your job done.
The integrated function of timeline edit will let you easily edit the timeline of your subtitle.
You even can play your movie to check your translated subtitle and fix the problem of timeline in your subtitle.

Using Subtitle Translation Wizard, you can finish subtitle translation within two clicks. When the automatically subtitle translation is done, you can still manually edit the translated subtitle. This will make your subtitle translation job is easily done. When the subtitle translaton is done, you can save the translated subtitle or mix subtitle that include original and translated subtitle.

With the tool, you can edit the timeline of your subtitle. You even can play your movie to check your translated subtitle and the timeline of your subtitle. 

Subtitle Translation Wizard provide a tool for code schema convert. Using this tool, you can convert a file from one code schema to another code schema. So, if a file's code schema is not right, you can correct it by using this subtitle translation tool.

Subtitle Translation Wizard will work on Windows 2000, XP, Vista, 7, 8 and above.

Homepage http://www.upredsun.com/subtitle-translation/subtitle-translation.html
